_sText:
This is my third map and I have FINALLY learned how to do lighting right(ish). I hope you enjoy it. It includes a nav map for NPCs so when you rescue hostages they actually follow (although not everywhere). It also includes a few explosive barrels so that you get more bang for your buck :).

STORY:
Police have been tipped off that a compound in Death Valley, California that allegedly belongs to SSi Industries in fact belongs to a group of terrorists. And they are planning something, whatever they are planning involves explosives, a lot of explosives. They are currently staging an attack on an unmentioned target. A counter-terrorist team has been sent in to prevent this act of terrorism before it happens. It is also been noted that some noncombatant engineers that were kidnapped in a previous attack are in the compound being forced to help manufacture improvised munitions. They must be escorted out of the compound alive, the things they witnessed could lead to a further crackdown on the terrorist cell.

CT objectives:
-Eliminate terrorists.
-Escort kidnapped noncombatants to the safety of the APC.
-Prevent injury to noncombatants.

T objectives:
-Eliminate counter-terrorists.
-Prevent engineers from escaping.
-Prevent engineers from being killed or injured because their skill is a vital aspect of the planned operation.
